answers.answer: Wondering if your appointment for the trial was today and how it went?Foo
I had to rescedule to this Monday the 17 for the screening.....really busy at work...its ok tho....im still goin for it....trial starts in Oct....all is well.

I had to reschedule also. They had me pencilled in last week and told me that I would have to begin within 8 weeks of that date which I wouldn't be ready to do. I was worried that they might blow me off, but they were super nice and have me in on the 29th now which should work.I'll stay tuned...

question: Higher levels of urinary Bisphenol A (BPA), a chemical compound commonly used in plastic packaging for food and beverages, is associated with cardiovascular disease, type 2 diabetes and liver-enzyme abnormalities,http://www.****.***
title: Plastic and the Liver
